data.lyric:
[ti:What Happens In A Small Town]
[ar:Brantley Gilbert/Lindsay Ell]
[al:What Happens In A Small Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]What Happens In A Small Town - Brantley Gilbert/Lindsay Ell
[00:04.06]Lyrics by：Brantley Gilbert/Rhett Akins/Brock Berryhill/Josh Dunne
[00:08.13]Composed by：Brantley Gilbert/Rhett Akins/Brock Berryhill/Josh Dunne
[00:12.19]Produced by：Dann Huff
[00:16.26]I can't go for a ride to clear my head
[00:19.83]'Cause everything I pass puts you back in it
[00:23.21]Yeah we're done movin' on
[00:26.50]But you can't be too far gone
[00:29.64]'Cause what happens in a small town stays in a small town
[00:34.07]Every back road we've ever gone down
[00:37.45]Friday night bleachers Sunday pews
[00:40.58]Ain't a county line mile without a memory of you
[00:44.13]Every whisper every room I walk in
[00:47.49]Every time the bartender fills it up again
[00:51.02]Everybody knows why I'm here and you ain't around
[00:57.64]'Cause what happens in a small town stays in a small town
[01:04.86]Oh we said this goodbye was the last
[01:08.58]I guess I could leave I could run from the past
[01:11.82]And from us and from you
[01:15.11]But this is where I belong this is my home too
[01:18.89]What happens in a small town stays in a small town
[01:22.73]Every back road we've ever gone down
[01:26.13]Friday night bleachers Sunday pews
[01:29.20]Ain't a county line mile without a memory of you
[01:32.79]Every whisper every room I walk in
[01:36.12]Every time the bartender fills it up again
[01:39.80]Everybody knows why I'm here and you ain't around
[01:45.90]'Cause what happens in a small town stays in a small town
[01:56.51]Yeah I'm still here yeah
[02:00.27]Yeah and every time I see that little white Jeep
[02:04.01]Yeah that hand-me-down Ford pullin' down your street
[02:07.57]You wonder if somebody's in my seat
[02:11.07]If you're movin' on or you're stuck like me
[02:14.64]What happens in a small town stays in a small town
[02:19.86]Oh yeah
[02:21.47]What happens in a small town stays in a small town
[02:25.26]Every back road we've ever gone down
[02:28.71]Friday night bleachers Sunday pews
[02:31.82]Ain't a county line mile without a memory of you
[02:35.39]Every whisper every room I walk in
[02:38.82]Every time the bartender fills it up again
[02:42.64]Everybody knows why I'm here and you ain't around
[02:47.08]You ain't around
[02:48.81]'Cause what happens in a small town stays in a small town
[02:55.85]It stays in a small town
[02:59.10]It stays in a small town
[03:02.70]And I'm still here
[03:03.37]What happens in a small town
[03:04.79]I'm still here
[03:06.47]Stays in a small town
[03:07.85]I'm still here
[03:09.53]Yeah I'm still here
[03:11.39]I'm still here
data.trans:
[ti:What Happens In A Small Town]
[ar:Brantley Gilbert/Lindsay Ell]
[al:What Happens In A Small Town]
[by:]
[offset:0]
[00:00.00]//
[00:04.06]//
[00:08.13]//
[00:12.19]//
[00:16.26]开车兜风也不能让我的头脑恢复清醒
[00:19.83]因为我走到哪里都能看到你的身影
[00:23.21]我们都结束了 该放下了
[00:26.50]可我一直忘不掉你
[00:29.64]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[00:34.07]我们一起走过每一条乡间小道
[00:37.45]周五晚上去了公园 周天去了教堂
[00:40.58]乡间小道上 到处都是关于你的记忆
[00:44.13]我走进每一个房间 都能想起你的呢喃声
[00:47.49]每次酒保给我斟满酒杯
[00:51.02]大家就明白我为何会出现在酒吧了 因为你不在身边
[00:57.64]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[01:04.86]我们说过 这一声再见就是永别了
[01:08.58]我以为我可以离开 我可以从回忆里走出来
[01:11.82]忘记我们的过往 忘了你
[01:15.11]但这里是我的归宿 也是我的家乡 
[01:18.89]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[01:22.73]我们一起走过每一条乡间小道
[01:26.13]周五晚上去了公园 周天去了教堂
[01:29.20]乡间小道上 到处都是关于你的记忆
[01:32.79]我走进每一个房间 都能想起你的呢喃声
[01:36.12]每次酒保给我斟满酒杯
[01:39.80]大家就明白我为何会出现在酒吧了 因为你不在身边
[01:45.90]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[01:56.51]我还在这里
[02:00.27]每次我看到那辆白色的小吉普车
[02:04.01]开着那辆破旧的福特汽车 沿着和你曾经走过的街道
[02:07.57]你在想 我身边是不是有了新人
[02:11.07]你是否已经放下过去 还是像我一样被过去纠缠
[02:14.64]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[02:19.86]//
[02:21.47]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[02:25.26]我们一起走过每一条乡间小道
[02:28.71]周五晚上去了公园 周天去了教堂
[02:31.82]乡间小道上 到处都是关于你的记忆
[02:35.39]我走进每一个房间 都能想起你的呢喃声
[02:38.82]每次酒保给我斟满酒杯
[02:42.64]大家就明白我为何会出现在酒吧了 因为你不在身边
[02:47.08]你不在身边
[02:48.81]曾经的一切都不可能重来
[02:55.85]不可能重来
[02:59.10]不可能重来
[03:02.70]我还在这里
